description:
Uncover the value of understanding the impact gender has on the sales arena to cultivate your business into a wildly growing success.

Discover useful techniques for:

  • driving up sales
  • attracting consumers
  • stimulating consumer interest through this gender based sales course

Gender is a simple concept - there are men and there are women.

Yet, so many businesses fail to incorporate this simple dynamic into their strategies, leaving an entire market untapped.

Women comprise a huge and increasing portion of consumer spending â†’ capitalize on consumer spending by targeting the differences between genders


3 Fundamental Components of Gender Intelligence

Gender Based Intelligence understanding the effects that gender-based consumption traits' have on sales
Men are from Mars; Women are from Venus using the influences that gender has on relationships and communications to increase sales
Incorporating Gender Intelligence into Sales develop the most effective sales processes and strategies through utilizing a gender-based framework approach


This unique course will lead you in acquiring the necessary skills for tailoring your sales presentations to suit the distinctions of each gender.

  • If you want to increase your sales and improve your sales strategies, then this is a course you cannot afford to pass by!
  • The difference between a growing business and a stagnant one is gender intelligence.
title: Mars Venus Gender Intelligent Sales Training.
